metadata.title: CVE-2021-42863 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow in ecma_builtin_typedarray_prototype_filter() inJerryScript version fe3a5c0 allows an attacker to construct a fake objector a fake arraybuffer with unlimited size.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
